intro: Psychotria anjouanensis, commonly known as Anjouan psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the Comoros Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces small, dark blue berries that contain the seeds. Due to its restricted distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
